channel.title: [Hyperion] RS2 Remake [The old school is back]
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt]RS2 Remake[/size][/center]
General [i]RS2 Remake, is based of hyperion. Thanks to graham for hes efford, and time to make hyperion. The server will be old-school. The economy will be nerly perfect, with skills minigames. There will be alot to do. It will be special if you actuelly pk a whip, or pk a set of barrrows. The mage will be near perfect.
[b]Started[/b] [i]I started this project a while back, like 5 months ago. therefore you'll find alot of updates.[/i]
[i]Developerment team[/i] [code] - Emoboyzzzzzz [/code]
Updates
[ul][li]Character rendering[/li] [li]Player saving[/li] [li]Loading playerRights though the character file[/li] [li]Defence bonuses[/li] [li]ItemOnItem class[/li] [li]MagicOnItem packet[/li] [li]FirstClickNpc packet[/li] [li]ItemOnObject[/li]
[li]Npcs'[/li] [li]Npc walking system[/li] [li]Npc loads though a CFG file[/li] [li]Correct npc masks[/li] [li]Following[/li] [li]Trading[/li] [li]Wilderness[/li] [li]Multi zones[/li] [li]Correct lava gfx[/li] [li]Npc dialouges[/li] [li]Weapon animations[/li] [li]Attack timers for range, melee, mage[/li] [li]PVN[/li] [li]Correct weapon specials[/li] [li]Range[/li] [li]Magic[/li] [li]Melee[/li] [li]Combat Class for PVP & PVN[/li] [li]Prayer draining[/li] [li]Prayer effects[/li] [li]Objects loads though a CFG file[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2sblgk6.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2jbmwht.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/14brsro.png[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/bfqe79.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/m79hkg.png[/img]
